Room.Name: Annetol Way/Teal Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are the intersection of Annetol Way and Teal Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: A huge blue-white pillar of flame shoots out of the ground behind a small building situated south of here. A fiery sign burns brightly near the entrance, and identifies this as the pyro testing grounds administered by the Iilandi University School of Pyrographic Phenomena.
